responseText:
Splendid! A sharp mind and steady fingers are all you need to begin. We'll start where we start any journey, from the beginning.

You'll learn how to plant the seed, fertilize the plot, and pluck each fruit at the peak of ripeness.

Find or purchase some seed, and water, gather some droppings, and grow yourself some Blackberries.

Bring your handiwork to me when you're done.
name: ANV_FTUE_BF_Artisan_Farming_Tama_6_Response
